metadata.title: CVE-2015-4715 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The fetch function in OAuth/Curl.php in Dropbox-PHP, as used in ownCloudServer before 6.0.8, 7.x before 7.0.6, and 8.x before 8.0.4 when anexternal Dropbox storage has been mounted, allows remote administrators ofDropbox.com to read arbitrary files via an @ (at sign) character inunspecified POST values.

criterions.comment: php-dropbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
